name: Blob town madness
description:
In this sandbox-like game, you set fire and rain meteors on a town of blobs. This was made in 1 week for the brackeys game jam. I made all the assets myself, except the font (and the game engine if you count that as an asset).

I forgot to mention in the instructions, but you can use Q and E to zoom in and out. Sorry, I don't have enough time to add it into the "How to play" menu, and re-build the game. HTML builds take a long time to build, and they take even longer on a low-tier laptop like mine.

Also, I planned to have sound effects and post processing, but I ran out of time.

I might make an improved version after the jam and voting period end.
